original_text: He has let us know his great purpose, which had been a secret before. That plan would make him very happy. It would be possible because of Christ.
korean_text: 그 뜻의 비밀을 우리에게 알리신 것이요 그의 기뻐하심을 따라 그리스도 안에서 때가 찬 경륜을 위하여 예정하신 것이니

sentences.original_text: He has let us know his great purpose
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 위대한 목적을 우리에게 알려주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: which had been a secret before
That plan would make him very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그 계획은 그를 매우 기쁘게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: It would be possible because of Christ
